ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank Michael Sharkey and Chaweewan Hutacharern for access to materials of the TIGER project. We would like to thank Wes Bicha for valuable comments. Thanks also go to all staff of the Entomology Section, for their assistance in sorting specimens of the longhorn beetles and their laboratory work, and we also thank Methee Wongnak, Botanist, at Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden, for helping to classify the forest types from each collection site.
